line_1: Oh folly worthy of the nurse's lap,
line_2: Give it the breast or stop its mouth with pap!

line_1: Driv'n from the ease of Fortune's lap,
line_2: New to the school of hard Mishap,

line_1: To lay your Head in every Lap,
line_2: And, when they think not of you — snap!

line_1: He laid his head in luxury's soft lap,
line_2: And took too often there his easy nap.

line_1: In showers of Gold on lovely Danae's Lap;
line_2: JOVE once descending from the Clouds, did drop
